description:
With the Spotify app, you can explore an extensive library of music and podcasts for free. Curate the best playlists and stream millions of free songs, albums and original podcasts on your mobile or tablet. Subscribe to Spotify Premium to download and listen offline wherever you are, and unlock our catalogue of audiobooks.

Why choose Spotify as your go-to music and podcast app? Here, you can:
• Listen to over 100 million songs and 6 million podcast titles
• Explore our selection of specially-crafted artist playlists
• Easily search for your favourite songs, albums, artists and podcasts
• Discover personalised music recommendations tailored to your unique taste
• Subscribe to your favourite free podcasts so you never miss an episode and even curate your own podcast library

Spotify Free is more than a music player – find the sounds that you love and stream music and podcasts online for free. Enjoy personalised playlists or curate and share your own, discover the hottest new releases, explore upcoming events from your favourites and more.

• Stream millions of free songs and podcasts
• Create playlists with your favourite music
• Share songs and playlists with friends and family (feature restrictions may apply in some regions)
• Discover personalised playlists made just for you, and collaborate on playlists with your friends
• Enjoy your personal Discover Weekly playlist every week
• Stay in the know with the Release Radar and New Music Friday playlists
• Find nearby events and gigs by your favourite artists
• See your most played songs, genres, artists and more with yearly Spotify Wrapped
• Stream music across your devices with Spotify
• Use Spotify Connect and enjoy listening on smart speakers, desktop, laptop, smart TV, Chromecast, PlayStation®, Xbox®, smartwatch, in your car and more – limited number of device models apply

Spotify Premium – a great way to enjoy the benefits of an offline music player and stream music without Wi-Fi. By pressing download, you can access your songs, playlists, podcasts and audiobooks offline, wherever you are.
• Listen to music, podcasts and audiobooks – all in one place
• Ad-free music listening: enjoy your music with no ad interruptions
• Enjoy full on-demand playback
• Audiobooks in Premium are currently available in the UK, US, Australia, Ireland, New Zealand and Canada. Discover 250,000+ audiobook titles with 15 hours/month of available listening for Premium Individual subscribers and Duo & Family plan managers.
• Superior sound quality on supported devices
• AI DJ: a personalised guide that knows your music taste so well that it can choose what to play for you
• Enjoy on desktop, mobile phone, tablet, computer, smartwatch and in your car
• Listen and control the listening session together by hosting a Jam in real time with friends
• Download songs, podcasts and audiobooks for offline listening without an Internet connection
• No contract required – cancel your subscription whenever you want

Spotify lets you play music wherever you are. Listen to your favourite songs and discover new music, podcasts and audiobooks with the Spotify app!

LOVE SPOTIFY?
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spotify
Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@spotify

Best FREE music player, video player, and downloader. Smart online music player. ALL FREE!

The most feature-rich music player with unique features: nearby music recognition, movies, picture in picture, AI recommendations, and much more. Enjoy music with a stunning dark theme.

Hundreds of millions of users choose our music apps! it’s a top 10 music app in over 100 countries. Join our 200M+ music family - download now!

Stream online music or movies to save device space!

Download over 30 million MP3 songs fast and play offline music anytime with equalizer, lyrics, bass boost, themes. Listen to offline music & video, podcasts, FM Radio, even when the screen is off.

Watch unlimited free movies & TV shows of any genre: Comedy, Action, Fantasy, Adventure, Horror, and more in any language!

The application provides streaming for non-commercial use only. All music content is legal. Note: This app is not a YouTube music downloader. YouTube music can be streamed but not downloaded.

• Unlimited free music for unlimited time! All the app features are free forever!  No limited skips, no accounts/subscriptions needed, no purchases at all!

• Find any song! Stream over 300 million free songs from YouTube.

• Picture in picture mode for multitasking: floating popup player with an ability to change the size and many other options.

• Listen to other users' playlists or import your own playlists from YouTube.

• Smart search: search any songs, artists, albums, artists, singles, covers, remixes, and more.

• Powerful 10 band equalizer with presets - enjoy your music in your way!

• Variable speed playback and BlueTooth headset controls.

• Battery saver with reduced brightness and taps protection.

• Music playing nearby recognition - discover new tracks on the go! Tap the mic button, and the app will identify music playing nearby and build playlists with similar songs.

• Unlimited free movies & TV shows. Tens of thousands of movies of any genre: Comedy, Action, Fantasy, Adventure, Horror, and more in any language!

• YouTube playlists import.

• All music player controls: repeats, shuffle, and more.

• Intelligent recommendations for featured music.

• Daily updated top charts and trending music playlists.

• Non-stop playback station mode based on smart AI recommendations.

• Create and manage your favorite playlists with any content: online, podcasts, etc.

• Share your music and playlists with your friends!

• Tons of different genres, moods, and other music categories: Hip-Hop, Reggaeton, Pop, Rock, Classical, Jazz, RnB, Urban, Dubstep, Drum, Electronic, etc.

• Rich audio and video lossless music format support: FLAC, ALAC, OPUS, MP3, AAC, OGG, M4A, WAV, AIFF, M4R, WMA, MP4, MKV, and many others.

• Import files over Wi-Fi and from the Files app

• Cast to TV and other devices.

• Sleep timer: fall asleep to your favorite music. Start your music, and then set the countdown timer. At the end of the countdown, the app softly stops your music.

• Ad-Free option.

Note: the app does not download YouTube videos and does not play YouTube in the background; use of the app is subject to your agreement with our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service: https://www.atplayer.com/privacy-policy.html

This app is the best source of unlimited music. The app has over 300 million online music tracks for streaming and over 30 million high-quality MP3 songs for download. ALL FREE!

Discover Music & Playlists with Audiomack – Stream & Download Offline

Audiomack is a music player and discovery app that lets you stream and download the hottest songs, mixtapes, albums, and playlists.

On the Audiomack free tier, listen and download songs and albums with no subscription needed. Play full songs and albums with unlimited skips and repeats, even in the background while using other apps. You can even make your own playlists, and stream and share them, all for free.

Whether you're into hip-hop, Afrobeats, R&B, amapiano, Latin, reggae, dancehall, pop, rock, or country, Audiomack helps you discover music and rising artists faster than ever.

Audiomack Free features:
- Stream music with full control: Play full tracks with unlimited skips. Build playlists, repeat your favorite songs, and listen the way you want, free.
- Listen offline, no wifi needed: Download music and mixtapes to your phone and play them anytime, even without data.
- Remix your songs with Audiomod: Customize playback with pitch control, speed adjustment, reverb effects, and presets like Nightcore, Sped Up, Daycore, Slow and Reverb, and more.
- Personalized Music Recommendations: Get new music picked just for you.
- Top charts and trending music: Explore what’s hot locally and globally - see what’s trending on our top music charts.
- Connect with artists: Follow your favorite artists and be the first to hear new releases and exclusive messages.

Audiomack+ (monthly subscription) features:
- No Ads: enjoy your music with no interruptions
- Premium listening experience: equalizer, hifi listening
- Premium mods: get access to more Audiomod presets

Trending Artists on Audiomack:
- YoungBoy Never Broke Again
- Yeat
- Post Malone
- Rod Wave
- Lil Durk
- Drake
- Burna Boy
- Asake
- Nicki Minaj
- Bad Bunny
- Peso Pluma

Explore the future of music streaming and offline listening—download Audiomack today and start discovering your sound.
Use of the Audiomack App and download feature is subject to your agreement with our Privacy Policy/TOS.

Privacy Policy: http://www.audiomack.com/privacy-policy
TOS: http://www.audiomack.com/about/terms-of-service

Explore the future of music – download Audiomack now!

Moozik est une plateforme de streaming musical avec plus de 40 000 titres de 5 000 artistes malagasy. Ecoutez, téléchargez et chantez gratuitement sur vos titres malagasy préférés, découvrez des playlists personnalisées et des recommandations intelligentes sur Moozik. Et profitez de la musique hors ligne sans utiliser vos données !


Pourquoi vous allez adorer Moozik ? 

- Nos artistes malagasy gagnent 2 à 3 fois plus que sur les autres plateformes. 
- Plus de 40 000 titres exclusivement malagasy. 
- Playlists créées par les meilleurs DJ de Madagascar. 
- Fonctionnalité de karaoké pour chanter vos chansons préférées. 
- Recommandations personnalisées basées sur vos goûts musicaux. 
- Interagissez avec d'autres utilisateurs grâce à la fonctionnalité de commentaires.


PRINCIPALES CARACTÉRISTIQUES 

- Téléchargement et Écoute Hors Ligne : Téléchargez des chansons et des playlists pour écouter de la musique hors ligne sans utiliser vos données. Utilisez Moozik comme lecteur multimédia pour lire toute votre musique locale depuis votre carte SD ou votre téléphone.

- Découvrez de Nouvelles Chansons : Avec Moozik, explorez des chansons de genres variés et découvrez de nouveaux artistes malagasy. Profitez de recommandations intelligentes qui vous surprendront par leur pertinence.

- Playlists Créés et éditées par des professionnels du milieu : En plus de vos playlists personnelles, nous vous proposons des Playlists organisées spécialement par les meilleurs DJ de Madagascar pour chaque situation de votre quotidien. Que ce soit pour travailler, faire du sport ou se détendre, Moozik a la playlist parfaite pour chaque moment.

- Soutenez les Artistes Malagasy : Chaque écoute, téléchargement, like, commentaire et partage sur Moozik aide nos artistes malagasy à atteindre un public plus large et à créer plus de musique de qualité.

- Karaoké : Chantez vos chansons préférées avec la fonctionnalité karaoké

- Interactions Sociales : Partagez votre expérience musicale avec d'autres utilisateurs via les commentaires sur chaque artiste, album, playlist, chanson.


Téléchargez Moozik maintenant et vivez une expérience musicale unique avec les meilleurs artistes malagasy !

Rejoignez la communauté Moozik :
https://www.facebook.com/moozikapp

Pour toutes questions ou demande d’informations: 
contact@moozik.io

What's that song? Shazam will instantly identify music playing around you or in apps like TikTok, Instagram, YouTube & Snapchat. Discover concerts near you, song lyrics, videos & more. With tens of millions of daily users, Shazam is trusted by music lovers worldwide.

“Shazam is a gift... a game changer” – Pharrell Williams, GQ 
“I don't know how we ever survived before Shazam” – Marshmello 
“Shazam is a kind of magic… You hear a song, hold your phone up like a wand and it tells you exactly what song it is, who sang it and lets you add it to your playlist or share it to your social media… How is that not magic?!” – Calum Scott

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT

* Identify music in an instant.
* Discover live shows near you from your favourite artists or through curated recommendations.
* Recognise songs even when you’re offline, using headphones or on a different app.
* Revisit your music discovery history in your library anytime.
* Get recommended songs and playlists similar to the music you’ve discovered.

USE SHAZAM ANYWHERE, ANYTIME

* Enable the Shazam widgets on your Lock Screen or Home Screen.
* Ask Siri, “What’s this song?” to use Shazam hands-free.
* Automate music discovery with the Shazam Shortcut in the Shortcuts app.

CONNECT WITH YOUR MUSIC

* Unlock extras from artists around the world.
* Open any song directly in Apple Music, Spotify, YouTube Music, Amazon Music & Deezer.
* Listen and add songs directly to your Apple Music playlists.
* Watch music videos of the songs you discover in Apple Music or YouTube.
* Follow along to songs with real-time, karaoke-style lyrics.
* See what’s trending locally and globally with Shazam Charts.

Availability and features may vary by country. For more information on Shazam’s privacy practices, please read the Privacy Policy, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/. Find out more and get support from AppleCare at https://support.apple.com/guide/shazam/welcome.

Tired of being restricted by Wi-Fi or network when listening to your favorite music?
Imagine a world where you can immerse yourself in music anytime, anywhere, without relying on an internet connection.

Now! We proudly present ASMR Musi, the ultimate solution for your music playback needs.

Asmr Musi is an all-in-one audio app designed to provide users with a complete audio journey. The app brings together a variety of soundscapes such as the crunch of chewing, the rustle of turning pages, the sound of soft whispers, the warmth of wood, the crinkling of packaging, the melodies of instruments, the click of nails, the scribbles of pens, and more.

Each auditory selection has been carefully curated to provide the best relaxation experience.
The app has an intuitive and easy-to-use interface that easily guides users through various sound categories and allows users to save bookmarks based on their personal preferences. In addition, it allows users to enrich their listening experience and broaden their sound horizons by recording personal audio files.

For those who want to keep their unique auditory moments forever, the in-app recording feature is a perfect solution. It allows users to capture, edit recordings, and manage their audio library by removing outdated tracks, ensuring a fresh and tailored listening experience at all times.

Create, share, and discover music without limits on BandLab – your all-in-one app for music creation, from ideation to distribution.

BandLab is your free song making and beat making app. Join over 60 million users expressing themselves freely on our social music platform. No matter your skill level or background, BandLab is your creative outlet with features designed for every step of your musical journey!

Record music on the go with an intuitive Digital Audio Workstation (DAW), built-in effects, and royalty free loops and samples – BandLab is the creative tool right in your pocket.

Create without limits with our multi-track Studio:
• An intuitive Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) to record, edit, and remix your music
• Apply built-in effects, or find loops and samples from our royalty-free sound packs to build a beat
• Access creator-friendly tools like Metronome, Tuner, AutoPitch (a pitch correction tool), and AudioStretch (a music transcription tool)
• Unlimited cloud storage and accessibility across all devices so you can take your Studio anywhere, and make music using just your desktop, tablet, or phone

Be part of a music-loving community:
• Connect and collaborate with like-minded artists
• Create playlists in your favorite genres
• Watch live streams from fellow creators

Propel your creator journey with BandLab Membership:
• Get early access to experimental features with Backstage Pass
• Score exclusive music industry access through Opportunities
• Release your music on major streaming platforms with Distribution
• Unlock more artist-centric features like Fan Reach and Profile Boost

Download BandLab now to explore a world of exciting possibilities!

► FEATURES:

• *NEW* Drum Machine – Our online sequencer makes it seamless to craft drum parts for your song. Create rhythmic drum patterns quickly with a library of genre-diverse drum sounds.
• Sampler – Make your own samples by recording sounds around you, or choose from over 15,000 royalty-free sounds and beats from BandLab Sounds to build a beat.
• 16-Track Studio – Bring your Studio anywhere. Access our multi-track DAW from anywhere – use it as an audio recording app, build a beat right from your phone, and more!
• 330+ Virtual MIDI Instruments – Need 808s for your beats, or synthesizers for your lead lines? Access over 330+ cutting-edge Virtual MIDI instruments to craft your beats right in Studio!
• Metronome and Tuner – Practice anywhere with our in-app Metronome and Tuner – designed for the modern music maker and producer.
• 300+ Vocal/Guitar/Bass Audio Presets – Unlock a curated library of world-class effects and presets for free. From ambient sounds to modulation effects, change up your sound in an instant.
• AutoPitch - Record your best vocals yet with this quality Auto-Tune alternative. Experiment and get creative with five unique vocal effects – Classic, Duet, Robot, Big Harmony, and Modern Rap.
• Looper – New to composing? Just pick a Looper pack in a genre you like, load it up, and you’ll have a starting point for building a simple beat or crafting a backing track!
• Mastering – Master unlimited tracks online for free before releasing your songs. Get a polished sound instantly with four mastering presets, created by Grammy-winning producers and sound engineers.
• Remix Tracks – Need inspiration for your next masterpiece? Put your unique twist on a public “Forkable” track shared by a fellow creator – remix their song and make it your own!
• Easy Beat Making - Craft a simple beat to rap or sing over with intuitive music making tools. Use royalty-free samples and artist packs as a quick starting point in Studio!
• Creator Connect - Connect with like-minded creators from around the world and start an epic music collaboration, wherever you are.

Terms of Use: https://blog.bandlab.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: https://blog.bandlab.com/privacy-policy/

Boomplay music app is a music player with over 100M songs across different genres like Pop music, Rock, Afrobeats, Afropop and Reggae from top artists. Stream and download music including the best new songs, albums and curated playlists on Boomplay for free and play music offline data-free!

WHY YOU'LL LOVE BOOMPLAY?
- Discover New Music And Trending Songs
Boomplay music player boasts more than 100M songs which include the new music and podcasts. Come and search for your favourite songs, artist, or podcasts. 

- Download Songs And Listen Offline
Boomplay music downloader allows you to play your favourite songs offline. You can also use Boomplay as a media player to play all your local music offline like MP3s, AAC, M4A, WAV, and other files from the local files from your SD card or phone.

- Personalized Playlists Made Just For You 
Boomplay knows your music taste better than anyone. You will be surprised by what new music and songs our recommendations will help you discover.

- Support The Artists You Love!
Boomplay streams now count towards Billboard Music Charts including Billboard Hot 100, Artist 100 as well as all other Billboard U.S. and global charts. Every click of Play, Listen, Download on Boomplay, maximizes the exposure of the artists to help creating more new music for their fans.

- Equalizer
Build your Equalizer and enjoy your favourite trending songs. 

- Lyrics
See the lyrics to the trending music.

- More Than A Music App
Join the 'Live' section on Boomplay to chat with artists and like-minded people. There are featured topics, opportunities to showcase talent in the online live house, and have fun with friends and strangers through party games.

With Boomplay, you could access to a world of new music, playlists, artists, and podcasts you love. Here’s Boomplay, worthy of being your default Music Downloader!

BOOMPLAY SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES
- Unlimited Music Downloads
The Subscriber could enjoy music downloader with unlimited free downloads, so you can even listen to music offline, without using your data! 

- No Ads
The Boomplay music player allows you to listen to an album, playlist, songs or podcast without ad breaks. 

- Premium Music Content
Enjoy the premium playlists that are created exclusively for subscribers. Discover the best music and add the playlists to your favourites.

-Best Quality Music
Enjoy higher quality new music in full 320kbps.

Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/BoomplayMusic 
Instagram： https://instagram.com/boomplaymusic
Twitter： https://twitter.com/BoomplayMusic
YouTube： https://www.youtube.com/c/BoomplayMusic

PROBLEMS? FEEDBACKS?
Email: usersupport@boomplay.com

【Monthly Subscription】
-- Subscription Period: One month.
-- Subscription Price: First-time users who subscribe through the App Store will not be charged for the first month, from the second month users will be charged a monthly fee of 2.99USD / 1.49USD / 900NGN / 29.99ZAR etc.
-- Payment: The payment will be deducted from users iTunes account once the purchase is confirmed.
-- Renewal: Subscription renews automatically unless user disables the auto-renew function at least 24 hours before the expiry date.
-- Subscription Management: If you need to cancel your subscription, please manually open the 'Settings' of iOS —> enter 'iTunes Store and App Store' —> Click 'Apple ID' , enter the ' Account Settings —> Page, click 'Subscription' , select Boomplay Monthly Subscription and cancel your subscription.
-- Privacy Policy: https://www.boomplay.com/conditions
-- Terms of Auto-renew: https://www.boomplay.com/conditions#auto-renew

Access the world's largest catalogue of guitar, bass & ukulele chords, tabs, and lyrics. Challenge yourself to learn your favourite songs and more!
 
You have choices galore:
 
• Search for songs by genre, rating, your ability, tuning level
• Explore UG Tab collections. Use the finder for your faves, fall in love with something new, feel the nostalgic vibes. Search by themes like House or Acoustic, or check out the latest album releases. Find collections based on your interests such as Star Wars or funky Bollywood beats.
• Focus on guitar techniques, find songs personal to you in collections from professional guitarists
• Anytime you feel inspired to share a song, create and upload your shot on the spot. It’s that easy! Share the best parts of your performance with your like minded community of fellow musicians.
• Reach your true musical potential – learn to play with UG Courses here. Access over 2500 lessons for any skill level and instrument type from guitar, drums to piano and more. Learn different styles and techniques with guidance from professional musicians. Progress at your own speed and on any device, anytime, anywhere.
• Play over 26,000 popular songs in their original sound with Tonebridge Guitar Effects
 
And it doesn’t end there
 
Check out all these features:
• More than 1,000,000 songs to explore guitar, bass & ukulele chords, tabs, and lyrics
• Watch videos of songs to refresh your memory or use as backing tracks
• Compile your favourite tabs in playlists from our tab collections
• Create ‘Personal’ tabs to edit chords, lyrics or change tabs to suit your needs
• Option to Switch to left-handed mode 
• Set a font style and size to match the tab
• Offline access to favourite tabs - available at all times
• Enjoy dark mode for a gig
 
With a Pro account:
• Use interactive tabs to play songs note by note, at your own pace
• Select the chord variation that best suits you from the world's biggest library of chords
• Use ‘Simplify’  to make difficult songs easier
• Jam with high quality tabs - over 22,500 that include backing tracks and synchronised lyrics
• Hit the right tempo with metronome
• Transpose songs to get just the right tone for you
• Take advantage of autoscroll during your practice sessions
• Achieve the right sound with the built-in guitar tuner
• Share, print, and export your fave songs
 
Problems or feedback?
We are always eager to improve your Tabs experience and strive for excellence in doing so. Let us help you in person by contacting our development team at support.ios@ultimate-guitar.com, and we will endeavour to meet your needs.
Please do not post bug reports or feature requests as an App Store review.
  
Subscription information:

• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package
• Subscriptions may be managed, and auto-renewal may be turned off via ‘Account Settings’ on your device after purchase
• There is no way to cancel your current subscription during its active period

If you're a person who, in a stream of inspiration, wants to quickly make a sketch or record a musical idea, lyrics or pick chords for a melody sounding in your head, then this app is for you.
We help not only bring your ideas to life, but also want to inspire you to new ones. We've prepared a lot of suggestions and tools for you to create without writer's blocks.
Our another important goal is to help you with finishing your drafts. We know it's not always easy or convenient to finish what you started, but we always encourage you to finish your project using quick access to tools and AI hints.

With our App it is now possible and accessible to everyone without exception. Notes understanding and musical education are not necessary!

◆ WRITE DOWN YOUR LYRICS
All notes and musical ideas are now in one place so you don’t lose anything.

◆ CHORDS LIBRARY
Choose chords from a large library or from the most frequently used ones - they're arranged in such a way as to quickly select the ones suitable for each other. You can also see recommendations for chords that might work for you. Listen to a chord by tapping on it. 
You can find different finger placement options and possibility to add chords to Favorites.
Also you can generate chord progressions in a given key and specify the major/minor for chords.

*** In order to add a chord to the text, you need to hold down the title of the chord (in a large square with frames at the edges) and drag it into the field above the text.

◆ AI RHYME GENERATOR
A smart generator of rhymes and synonyms will help you easily compose texts and find inspiration. Type in the word you want and the app will offer suggestions for you.

◆ CHORDS SUGGESTER
When you drag a chord into the lyrics, the app will suggest which chords go well with each other.

◆ CHORD PROGRESSIONS
You can choose chords in any genre and for any mood - we've prepared the huge library so that you can find the chord progressions to your taste.

◆ SONG TAGS
Now you can tag the desired part of the song (e.g. chorus, verse, solo, etc.). This feature will help you build a visual structure of the song. There are ready-made tags for these purposes, but you can also create your own.

◆ RECORD AUDIO
Record musical ideas and demo tracks directly in the app - the lyrics will always be before your eyes. No more switching between different apps and screens.
You can record as many tracks and takes as you want, and it will always be stored in your project.

◆ TUNE MUSIC INSTRUMENTS
A simple and accurate chromatic tuner will help you set up your musical instrument correctly, since any song starts with that. We think that it's essential part for song writing :)

◆ CIRCLE OF FIFTH
We have an updated Circle of Fifth with the improved chord selection algorithms. Here you can choose the desired sounding from various musical modes (for example, Lydian, Ionian, etc.).

◆ TEXT AUTO-SCROLLING
Set the convenient scroll speed for your text and sing without interruptions. In the settings you can choose one of two modes: with chords playback and highlighted text, and standard scrolling.

◆ FILES EXPORT
You can export the project to an audio file: either an archive with all tracks in m4a format, or each track separately. You can also download a finished PDF file for printing.

◆ MANAGE & SEARCH SONGS
Now you can distribute your songs into folders, select your own covers, quickly search and sort your songs.

◆ COLOR SETTING
Change the color scheme of the app for yourself.

••• We love to write songs and create music, therefore, we made this app for all songwriters so inspiration never leaves you, and so there is always a place to write down your ideas •••

Created by musicians for other musicians.

You can write all your suggestions and remarks in the comments or send us an email - soundshallapps@gmail.com
This will help us make the app better for everyone! 

Terms Of Use (https://shorturl.at/7LtAP)
Privacy Policy (https://shorturl.at/gvQR1)

GuitarTuna is your go-to guitar app, with over 100 million downloads and counting! Tune your guitar in seconds with the free guitar tuner, explore guitar chords & tabs for 20,000+ songs, and learn how to play guitar songs you love with trainers, tutorials & personalized feedback.

Why you’ll love Guitartuna
• Tune any guitar, ukulele, violin or bass perfectly with easy-to-use tuning
• Switch seamlessly between guitar tuner, ukulele tuner, bass tuner & more
• Get guitar tabs & chords for your favorite songs
• Learn guitar songs with trainers, tutorials & personalized feedback
• Practice like a pro with essential tools for guitar
• Play songs you love at any skill level – guitar beginners included!
• Become a better guitar player with an all-in-one guitar app in your pocket

How it works
• Just pluck a string on your instrument and GuitarTuna detects the sound using your device’s microphone.
• You’ll get instant visual feedback while tuning. No cables needed.
• With our audio recognition technology, you’ll get insanely accurate tuning. Noise cancellation technology eliminates background noises while you tune.

Learn songs with guitar tutorials
• Learn guitar songs with video tutorials & interactive trainers
• Get personalized feedback to improve your guitar playing
• Create your own personalized learning path
• Get tips from expert guitarists

Play songs with guitar tabs & chords
• Explore guitar tabs for 20,000+ popular songs by top global artists
• Get pro-quality guitar chords & guitar tabs
• Choose guitar tabs & chords for your skill level
• Play at your own pace while chords & tabs sync with you
• Request guitar tabs & chords for your favorite songs
• New guitar songs & tabs added weekly!

Tools to practice guitar like a pro
• Metronome: Set your tempo & customize your time signature with the metronome tool
• Chord games: G chord giving you trouble? Learn, practice & master guitar chords with customizable games.
• Ear trainer: Improve your music skills & recognize chords by ear
• Chord library: Explore guitar chords with diagrams & audio
• Left-hand mode: Easily switch between right & left hand modes

Unleash Your Musical Talent with Smule - The Original Karaoke App! Sing over 10 million of your favorite songs with music and scrolling lyrics. Enjoy karaoke for free anytime, anywhere! Join Smule’s global music community, where you can record solos, duets, and group performances - with or without video. Elevate your singing with professional voice effects and share your creations with millions worldwide. Explore a vast library across genres like pop, rock, R&B, country, K-pop, and more. From chart-topping hits to classics, Smule has something for everyone. Stay on pitch with real-time scrolling lyrics and our pitch guide for flawless performances.

Collaborate with Top Artists: Experience the thrill of singing alongside top artists in recorded duets. Smule offers unique opportunities to collaborate with popular musicians, allowing you to feel like a star!

Key Features:
•  Sing Anytime, Anywhere: Access over 10 million karaoke songs with scrolling lyrics. Enjoy a massive catalog of songs!
•  Record & Share: Capture your singing in solo, duet, or group performances, and share your creations with the Smule community.
•  Duet with Top Artists: Sing alongside popular artists like Ed Sheeran, Olivia Rodrigo, Dua Lipa, classic Disney characters, and more! Smule lets you perform duets with recordings of top names in music. Unleash your inner star!
•  Professional Vocal Recording: Use studio quality vocal recording tools with special voice effects, reverb and voice tune to enhance your recordings
•  Music Video Creator: Create music videos with a karaoke mixer and add vocal effects that elevate your performances.
•  Live Global Performances: Go live and shine! Host or join live karaoke parties with the Sing Live feature, giving real-time performances 24/7 with friends and music lovers worldwide! Share your talent live, gain fans, receive feedback, and perform for an interactive audience.
•  Learn and Improve: Access vocal lessons, practice with our pitch guide, and track your progress.
•  Join Exciting Challenges: Participate in regular karaoke contests and events to showcase your talent and win rewards.
•  Create and Customize: Transform your voice with professional-grade effects like reverb, AI powered tools, and more. Use our music studio features to mix and edit your recordings, add video filters, and create captivating music videos.

Connecting the World Through Music™: At Smule, we believe music is a universal language that brings people together. Join our diverse community of music lovers from the UK and around the world, and share in the joy of creating and experiencing music together.

Download Smule Today and Start Your Musical Journey! Whether you dream of performing on a big stage or just love singing along to your favorite tunes, Smule is your ticket to a world of music, creativity, and connection. Sing, record, and share your voice today, and discover endless possibilities with Smule.

description:

iTendry: Learn guitar chords
About this app
iTendry is a - mobile and desktop, offline - application promoting music from Madagascar, through the learning of chords composing hundreds of Malagasy songs.
It offers lyrics with chords very easily applicable to the guitar and also to the ukulele. For this, you are given a wide variety of songs, not only those accompanied by these instruments in their original versions.

The format:
The simplified format of the compositions will allow personal input from users as they learn.

Bonus:
At the user's disposal :
• An infinite number of chord grids in the ACCORDS section to simplify learning
• Tuners in the TUNER section to facilitate the tuning of the instrument / find a tuner of the OPEN GASY

The features of the application
- Guitar and ukulele chord list with images and sounds
- Instrument tuner with various tunings including "Tendry sasy"
- Notation in : Do Ré Mi
- Mutli language
- Clickable chords
- Dark mode
- Transposition
- Automatic scrolling
- Touch to play notes instead of displaying diagrams
- Display guitar fingering notes directly on diagrams
- Simultaneous display of song video
- Quiz d'accords (mode expérimental)
- Simultaneous viewing of the song's video
- +200000 chord grids in different tunings: Tendry Gasy, open D, Guitalele, ...
- 432Hz tuner option
- Instrument: piano (experimental mode)
- Display lyrics only mode
- Show/Hide chord indications

If you notice incorrect transcriptions in the application you can put in comment the title of the song, or contact us directly by mail contact@itendry.com or via our Facebook page ITendry
